definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: China's Foreign Ministry expressed concern on Tuesday about the South Korean-U. S. drills.
sentences.chinese: 中国外交部对于周二的韩美联合军演表达了关注。

sentences.english: S. Korea starts massive drills near border.
sentences.chinese: 韩国将在朝韩边境举行最大规模军演。

sentences.english: The two countries instead conducted the drill on the east side of the Korean peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 两国改在朝鲜半岛东测举行了军演。

sentences.english: North Korea protests strongly against such exercises, but they have been uneventful in the past.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜强烈抗议这样的军演，但过去并没有激烈的动作。

sentences.english: Aki-Kun, then why Japan always has routine military grills with USA?
sentences.chinese: 那为什么日本总是与美国进行常规军演？

sentences.english: The exercise was named as "island wins battle."
sentences.chinese: 这次军演曾被命名为“夺岛作战”。

sentences.english: China's Foreign Ministry expressed concern on Tuesday about the South Korean-U.S. drills.
sentences.chinese: 中国外交部对于周二的韩美联合军演表达了关注。

sentences.english: Exercise of the rumbling guns once again to put the spotlight on the Korean peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 军演的隆隆炮声再一次把朝鲜半岛置于聚光灯下。

sentences.english: India had hosted the Chinese Army for the exercise in December 2008 at Belgaum.
sentences.chinese: 印度2008年在贝尔高姆与中方军队进行了军演。

sentences.english: North Korean missile threat to Japan-US joint military exercise has been an important goal.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜导弹威胁一直是日美联合军演的重要目标。

sentences.english: Therefore, pointing an imaginary enemy or exercise, is obviously very clear.
sentences.chinese: 所以假想敌或者说军演的指向，显然是非常清楚的。

sentences.english: It is appreciated in the region.
sentences.chinese: 这些军演在该地区很受重视。

sentences.english: Could you outline China's core interests? And in what way will the US-ROK joint naval exercise compromise China's core interests?
sentences.chinese: 美韩联合军演在哪些方面会损害中国的核心利益？

definition: military aircraft/secret plan/Privy Council during the Qing dynasty
to form into columns/to organize into teams/formation (of ships or aircraft)
